values:
YES!OS has been approved...1000 thanks to Madam Cindy...queen of approvals :-P...Look for OS horses in the RTS Jumper Classic, and Foxwood's Opening Show!

Liz

It's a filly!
Our lovely mare, OS Shoot The Moon,has given birth to her first foal,OS Calypso.She luckily had a perfect birth with no complications.Cally's stats are below!

Registered Name: OS Calypso
Breed:Irish Sporthorse
Age:Speed aged to four years old
Height:To Mature To about 17.0hh
Sire x Dam:OS Vertically Challenged x OS Shoot The Moon
Disciplines:Hunters
Color:Chestnut
Markings:Star and 2 hind socks

*Pictures Available!*
                    -Liz

Hey all!Today is the day...yep...the day of truth... will OS be approved?!? I sure hope so...

More later...
     - Liz
